title: Hola Havana
text:
By: Luis Carlo San Juan - Contributing Editor / @inquirer2bu 09:08 AM March 13, 2017 
It was a Latin party people wouldnâ€™t forget as Bench launched its 2017 summer campaign during the first ever Bench Fashion Week last weekend at Bench Tower in BGC, Taguig. 
In celebration of its Summer 2017 campaign shot in Havana, Cuba, models strutted the runway decked in military pieces, mixed with florals, brights, and bandanas, to the rhythmic Cuban beat of a drum ensemble. The audience got a good feel of this Caribbean island. See the full collection and the show here. 
Visit our Facebook page: To be You to watch the fashion show ADVERTISEMENT New Bench model, Pietro Boselli PHOTOS BY GLETTE-YZAK MURING Miss Philippines 2016 Maxine Medina Miss Philippines 2013 Ara Arida Michelle Dee
